scripts.e2e:wait: sh -lc ": \"\${APP_BASE_URL:?APP_BASE_URL is required in e2e/.env}\"; URL=\"\${APP_BASE_URL}\"; until curl -sf \"$URL/\" >/dev/null; do sleep 1; done"
scripts.test:e2e: npm run e2e:up && npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run e2e:wait && npx dotenv -e .env -- playwright test; code=$?; npm run e2e:down; exit $code
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run e2e:up && npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run e2e:wait && npx dotenv -e .env -- playwright test --headed; code=$?; npm run e2e:down; exit $code
scripts.test:e2e:docker: docker compose -f ../app/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.yml run --rm tests; code=$?; docker compose -f ../app/docker-compose.yml down -v; exit $code
